text:
NDS,Todd's Paralysis
What are the treatments for Todd's Paralysis ?,There is no treatment for Todd's paralysis. Individuals must rest as comfortably as possible until the paralysis disappears.,NINDS,Todd's Paralysis
What is the outlook for Todd's Paralysis ?,Todd's paralysis is an indication that an individual has had an epileptic seizure. The outcome depends on the effects of the seizure and the subsequent treatment of the epilepsy.,NINDS,Todd's Paralysis
